Free Online Tools by SinzTools

Discover all our free, privacy-first tools organized by category. Each tool runs entirely in your browser for maximum security and speed.

What are SinzTools?

SinzTools provides free online utilities for users. All tools are designed to be fast, secure, and easy to use without requiring sign-ups or downloads.

PDF tools

  • PDF Merge Tool - Combine multiple PDF files into one
  • PDF Split Tool - Extract pages from PDF documents
  • PDF Unlock Tool - Remove password protection from PDF files

Image tools

  • Image to PDF Converter - Convert images to PDF documents
  • Image Converter - Convert between multiple image formats
  • Image Compressor - Reduce image file sizes
  • Image Resizer - Resize images to custom dimensions
  • Image Watermark Tool - Add text watermarks to images
  • Image Crop Tool - Crop images to custom areas
  • Favicon Generator - Create favicons from images
  • PNG to JPG Converter - Convert PNG images to JPG
  • PNG to WEBP Converter - Convert PNG images to WEBP
  • JPG to WEBP Converter - Convert JPG to WEBP format
  • WEBP to JPG Converter - Convert WEBP to JPG
  • WEBP to PNG Converter - Convert WEBP images to PNG

Video tools

  • Video Compressor Tool - Compress videos for smaller file sizes
  • Video to GIF Converter - Convert videos to animated GIFs

All tools run entirely in your browser. No files or personal data are uploaded or stored. Return to Home.
